TopicTitle: How to make your own type of fuel

Articles.Content:
I was fascinated by the Kethane Pack at making "Energy" "kethane" and "Power" as a fuel.

How do we do that?

I'm just starting to learn.

But I believe each type of fuel has its own module.

That is module = FuelTank for regular fuel and module = RCSFuelTank for RCS thrusters.

So you need to write a module for Kethane fuel and I have no idea how to yet.

The wiki does have some info on modding, but it is incomplete.

http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Part_Modelling_Guidelines

http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/CFG_File_Documentation

I think this has more to do with modules:

Note look at post #3 for Resource definitions

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/10296-0-15-code-update-PartModule-KSPField-KSPEvent-ConfigNode-and-PartResource?highlight=PartModule%2C+KSPField%2C+KSPEvent%2C+ConfigNode+PartResource

Edited September 10, 2012 by Tommygun
